name: ott-platform-microservices
description: Netflix-style OTT Platform with Microservices Architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run gateway" "npm run auth" "npm run user" "npm run content" "npm run streaming" "npm run recommendation" "npm run admin" "npm run admin-dashboard"
scripts.install-services: cd gateway && npm install && cd ../services/auth && npm install && cd ../user && npm install && cd ../content && npm install && cd ../streaming && npm install && cd ../recommendation && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm install
scripts.migrate: cd services/user && npm run migrate && cd ../content && npm run migrate && cd ../recommendation && npm run migrate && cd ../streaming && npm run migrate && cd ../admin && npm run migrate
scripts.seed: cd services/auth && npm run seed && cd ../user && npm run seed && cd ../content && npm run seed && cd ../recommendation && npm run seed && cd ../streaming && npm run seed && cd ../admin && npm run seed
